thread.title: Kate Rose Manser
thread.title_full: TrustedHousesitters reviewed by Kate Rose Manser

author: Kate Rose Manser
title: Kate Rose Manser
text: I've been using TrustedHousesitters for several months now and I couldn't be happier. I am housesitting all over the world! I also use the site to find Housesitters for my own house and dogs. The site is easy to use and it'/ worth the membership fee for sure.
